description:
Selected Works of Kimberly L. Alderman. Selected Works of Kimberly L. Alderman.
Kimberly Alderman is a Clinical Assistant Professor in the Frank J. Remington
Center, supervising students in the Criminal Appeals Project (CAP) and the Legal
Assistance to Institutionalized Persons Project (LAIP). She also teaches a Cultural. Property Law seminar course and an Art Transactions skills course.
